data.text: A speaker is made and is not born.

data.text: I made myself a great presenter and speaker.

translation.text: nhiều, nhiều năm

data.text: And over the years, I've learned a lot of lessons.

data.text: I'm gonna teach some of the most important lessons

data.text: if you're speaking with an accent,

data.text: none of this shit matters.

title: How I Mastered The Art Of Public Speaking
